editions.effect:
**Hindered**

[Ciel Bonus] As long as your champion hasn't been %attacked%dealt combat damage% this turn, your champion has **taunt**.

[Ciel Bonus] (3), [REST], **Banish Servant's Obligation**: **Summon** a Vacuous Servant token.
